comments:
Using build 200605220100, when I execute a test on Windows I get the following exception :

org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.InactiveProcessException
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.TestExecutionHarnessExecutorStub.launch(TestExecutionHarnessExecutorStub.java)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.TestExecutionHarness.launchTestExecution(TestExecutionHarness.java)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.TestExecutionHarness.access$2(TestExecutionHarness.java:1800)
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.harness.TestExecutionHarness$2.run(TestExecutionHarness.java:735)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

Note:  This work OK on Linux. 

This blocks me from running my tests for 4.2 Iteration 3 Test Pass 2.

Updated priority to P1.

It looks like in ExecutorStub.waitForProcess() , it can never find the process it is looking for, times out and throws an InactiveProcessException.
Mark has a fix in hand for this.  Don't spend time investigating.
Fix checked in 4/24/06 at around 4 pm (EDT).

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
